description: Build strength and muscle mass through resistance training.
Improve flexibility, balance, and mental well-being through various yoga poses.
Enhance cardiovascular health with aerobic exercises like running and cycling.
Combine various functional movements at high intensity for a full-body workout.
Focus on lifting weights to build muscle strength and power.
Engage in exercises that mimic everyday movements to enhance overall fitness.
Combine martial arts techniques with cardio for a high-energy workout.
